DEMO_803_MSG_010:
̂She called this thing the Planet Seed. This is what we're going to need to use in order to rescue Lenate.
ā
DEMO_803_MSG_020:
̂The Planet Seed is, literally, a seed for a planet.
It's the function Mother uses during planet creation.
DEMO_803_MSG_100:
̂Heh heh heh... it's pretty intimidating, isn't it?
ā
DEMO_803_MSG_030:
̂Lenate integrated herself with the Core in order to
supplement Mother and help her sustain her damage.
ā
DEMO_803_MSG_110:
̂Don't sweat it, though! With a little help from me, I
think we'll be able to pull this off!
ā
DEMO_803_MSG_040:
̂However, by using this Planet Seed to repair Mother, 
Lenate will no longer need to stabilze her damage levels.
ā
DEMO_803_MSG_120:
̂First things first. Let's head to the Centre Building. 
I want to talk with the Nochoro King about... er, something.
DEMO_803_MSG_050:
̂The thing is, though... this Planet Seed is not ready. 
It's missing a few parts we call Planet Shards.
DEMO_803_MSG_060:
̂It's missing three Planet Shards in total. They reside 
on the other sides of the wormholes ahead.
DEMO_803_MSG_070:
̂The Gods of Creation live on the other side of the wormholes Each requires you to earn its Planet Shard.
ā
DEMO_803_MSG_080:
̂As they are the Gods of Creation... you can imagine that their powers are unfathomable.
ā
DEMO_803_MSG_090:
̂Even Anses, backed by an entire horde of monsters,
proved not to be enough to earn them...
